Module Game
Package Controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
Controller.TurnController
public class TurnController extends Object
This is one of the most important classes in this program. It handles the whole turn.

      private void setButtons()
      Called in constructor, sets buttons and their events.

    • chooseFigure

      public void chooseFigure(int col, int row)
      This is called when player, presses a button on the checkerboard, it either shows possible moves, makes a move if the button is highlighted as possible move, or does nothing if you can not move the pressed piece.

    • finishMovement

      public void finishMovement(int newRow, int newCol)
      This is called when movement conditions are met and is finishes the movement, updates positions, updates checkerboard, and the grid. When the movement is done, it finds all possible moves of the opponent player and if he has none, ends the game.

    • possibleMoveDisplayCall

      public void possibleMoveDisplayCall()
